Project_Description: Our design aids patients recovering from Achilles tendon ruptures by facilitating plantarflexion and dorsiflexion rehabilitation exercises at home. It offers adjustable resistance to support progressive rehabilitation, collects and displays user-progression data on an accompanying mobile app, and is size-adjustable. This device aims to enhance patient adherence to therapy, track user recovery and improve communication between patients and therapists, supporting effective rehabilitation without compromising accessibility. This project addresses the need for a supportive, adjustable, and data-driven rehabilitation journey.
Team_Members: Emma Louie, Noura Almawi, Sammi Szeto, Kelly Lu
